ARD_FUN_RUN_TIP: Defines the Arduino setup() and loop() functions.
ARD_PIN_WARN1: Pin %1 is needed for %2 as Pin %3. Already used as %4.
ARD_VAR_AS_TIP: Sets a value to a specific type
VARIABLES_INIT_TOOLTIP: assign an initial value for a variable.
VARIABLES_INIT_NOT_IN_SETUP_WARNING: Warning: This block may only be used within SETUP.
VARIABLES_INIT_REDEFINED_WARNING: Warning: The variable %1 can not be redefined.
ARD_TIME_MICROS_TIP: Returns the number of microseconds since the Arduino board began running the current program. Has to be stored in a positive long integer
ARD_TIME_MILLIS_TIP: Returns the number of milliseconds since the Arduino board began running the current program. Has to be stored in a positive long integer
ARRAY_TAB_CREATE_FIX: create block 'set element in array %1 to'
ARRAY_CREATE_WITH_CONTAINER_TOOLTIP: Add, remove, or reorder sections to reconfigure this array block.
ARRAY_CREATE_WITH_ITEM_TOOLTIP: Add an item to the array.
ARRAY_CREATE_WITH_TOOLTIP: Create a array with any number of items.
ARRAY_GETINDEX_TOOLTIP1: returns the value stored in the list or table
ARRAY_GETINDEX_TOOLTIP2: created a list or table of the selected type
ARRAY_GETINDEX_TOOLTIP3: sets one(or more) item(s) in the list or array to the specified value(s)
ARRAY_DECLARE_TOOLTIP: create an array of specific type and number of elements
ARRAY_MODIFY_TOOLTIP: set a specific value to an element of an array
